item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Top US officials shared classified details of military strikes with journalist
2. Trump to hit countries that buy Venezuelan oil with 25% tariff
3. Paul Weiss chair says Trump executive order could have destroyed law firm
4. Wealthy Americans seek refuge from Trump in Swiss banks
5. ‘Remarkable sloppiness’: Trump officials’ chat breach shakes Washington
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
